# treadle

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of treadle is to provide helper functions that visualize and manipulate single cell RNA-sequencing data from loom files. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of treadle from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("amyh25/treadle")
```
